linksPage.title: Create and share payment link conveniently and quickly through social media or email. We support multiple payment methods to minimize transaction fee and avoid development complications.

steps.content: Share link with your customer through social media
Customer can open and pay immediately

left.title: Paid link for buyer to fill in.
left.subtitle: You can copy this link to your buyers.

fieldsWrap.label2: I acknowledge that I will NOT claim the refund or cancel the order.

right.subtitle: Flexible Payment
right.title: Pay-by-Link allows customers to specify the payment value themselves.
right.textBlock: Perfect for e-commerce or shops with multiple products, prices, and orders. Convenience for simple and straightforward payment.

items.content: Merchant don’t need to handle about this payment link much , a payer will fill in by themselves
If a payer fill in wrongly, or forgot some transportation expense or some extra plans to pay. Will cause more merchant’s back-end system.

left.subtitle: Most precise
left.title: Accurate Payment
left.textBlock: Pay-by-Link also allows shopkeepers to specify the payment value and product details to safeguard against mistakes, as well as managing stock accurately by checking how many payment links have been created and completed.

items.content1: A payer just only double check the product’s detail before making a payment.
items.content2: A payment link can be counted as per success payment. This can help the stock of products.

items.content: A payment link can be used for individual payer only.

right.title: Get paid shop details
right.subtitle: You can set details and send links to your customers.
